FIRST_LAUNCH.TEXT_1: Welcome to the Orchid network, where the internet belongs to US
FIRST_LAUNCH.TEXT_2: Connect to the entire internet safely and securely from anywhere in the world. Your data is your own, not somebody else’s
FIRST_LAUNCH.TEXT_3_SUBTITLE: Earn extra income while helping to build a freer, more open society.
FIRST_LAUNCH.TEXT_3: Save, share, trade or exchange Orchid tokens for local or digital currency or to purchase bandwidth from other users on the Orchid network.

DASHBOARD.PLEASE_ADD: Please add some OCT to connect
DASHBOARD.TOOLTIP_CONNECTION: Connect or disconnect to the Orchid Network at any time. Through the Orchid Network, you can connect to the internet safely and privately.
DASHBOARD.TOOLTIP_GB_REMAINING: This an estimate of how much data (in gigabytes) you can use. This number goes up or down with the funds in your account and is likely to decrease faster when you’re using more data (ex. streaming video) and other network factors.
DASHBOARD.TOOLTIP_LOCATION: As a Buyer, you can choose a browsing location in any country in the dropdown list. For example, to experience BBC news as a resident of the United Kingdom would, just select the UK as your browsing location. This is where you’ll appear to be located when browsing the Internet and the IP address used for your session will belong to a UK-based device.
DASHBOARD.TIP_LOCATION_CONTENT: Select the default location for your internet connection. This is where you will appear to be connecting to the internet from.
DASHBOARD.TIP_FUND_CONTENT: You will need to add some Orchid tokens (OCT) to your wallet in order to use the Orchid Network.

WALLET_SETUP.TITLE: Time to fund your account
WALLET_SETUP.TRANSFER_COPY: Transfer some Orchid tokens to your wallet to start using Orchid
WALLET_SETUP.WHERE: Where can I get Orchid tokens?
WALLET_SETUP.HOW: How do I transfer tokens to my wallet?
